Name:
HMS Godetia, originally Dart
HMS Godetia
Builder: John Crown & Sons Ltd, Sunderland, England
Out of service:
Transferred to the Royal Navy Belgian Section[clarification needed]
16 December 1944
Fate:
Scrapped in 1947
Returned to the Royal Navy
Range: 3,450 nmi (6,390 km; 3,970 mi) at 12 knots (22 km/h; 14 mph)
Armament:
1 × BL 4-inch (102 mm) Mk IX gun
2 × Oerlikon 20 mm (0.8 in) cannon
2 × Depth charge throwers
2 × Rails with 40 depth charges
